title: Why the Soviet Union collapsed and the arms race

content.prompt: Which of the following was a significant long-term cause of the collapse of the Soviet Union during the late twentieth century?

choices.label: Geopolitical rivalry between the Soviet Union and communist China
The dismantling of the Berlin Wall and the end of restrictions on emigrating from communist countries
The cost of the arms race between the Soviet Union and the United States

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
